    • 字段详细资料

      • TYPE_SECTION

        public static final int TYPE_SECTION
        由于RecyclerView的灵活性，可能会出现不同的Adapter的嵌套，而因此可能导致viewType重复。 因此在这里尝试为每个Adapter定义一个区间，而避免它们的重复问题。
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 构造器详细资料

      • HiRecyclerAdapter

        public HiRecyclerAdapter(RecyclerView.Adapter wrapperAdapter)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getWrapperAdapter

        public RecyclerView.Adapter getWrapperAdapter()

      • getContentPosition

        public int getContentPosition(int position)

      • onCreateViewHolder

        public final RecyclerView.ViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup parent,
                                                        int viewType)

      • onCreateHeaderHolder

        protected abstract RecyclerView.ViewHolder onCreateHeaderHolder(ViewGroup parent,
                                                                int viewType)
        Called when RecyclerView needs a new header RecyclerView.ViewHolder of the given type to represent an item.
        参数:
        parent - The ViewGroup into which the new View will be added after it is bound to an adapter position.
        viewType - The view type of the new View.
        返回:
        A new ViewHolder that holds a View of the given view type.

      • onCreateFooterHolder

        protected abstract RecyclerView.ViewHolder onCreateFooterHolder(ViewGroup parent,
                                                                int viewType)
        Called when RecyclerView needs a new footer RecyclerView.ViewHolder of the given type to represent an item.
        参数:
        parent - The ViewGroup into which the new View will be added after it is bound to an adapter position.
        viewType - The view type of the new View.
        返回:
        A new ViewHolder that holds a View of the given view type.

      • onBindViewHolder

        public final void onBindViewHolder(RecyclerView.ViewHolder holder,
                                   int position)

      • onBindHeaderHolder

        protected abstract void onBindHeaderHolder(RecyclerView.ViewHolder holder,
                                           int position)
        Called by RecyclerView to display the header at the specified position. This method should update the contents of the RecyclerView.ViewHolder#itemView to reflect the header item at the given position.
        参数:
        holder - The ViewHolder which should be updated to represent the contents of the item at the given position in the data set.
        position - The position of the item within the adapter's data set.

      • onBindFooterHolder

        protected abstract void onBindFooterHolder(RecyclerView.ViewHolder holder,
                                           int position)
        Called by RecyclerView to display the footer at the specified position. This method should update the contents of the RecyclerView.ViewHolder#itemView to reflect the footer item at the given position.
        参数:
        holder - The ViewHolder which should be updated to represent the contents of the item at the given position in the data set.
        position - The position of the item within the adapter's data set.
